Career

Summary

Biography

2021/JUNIOR

Started in all 51 games for the Trojans during the 2021 season

Posted a slash line of .253/.355/.489

Notched 12 home runs, good for the team lead and 7th in the Pac-12

Also had five doubles, and one triple

Recorded 46 hits, scored 28 runs, and posted 20 RBI

Had 11 multi-hit games and five multi-RBI games

Recorded two home runs against Loyola Marymount twice (2/20 and, 2/21) and Arizona once (4/23)

2020/SOPHOMORE: Started all 15 games for the Trojans during the Pandemic shortened 2020 season … Posted a slash line of .346/.400/.577 and a team high 18 hits … .577 slugging percentage was 7th in the Pac-12 … Drove in 17 runs (6th in the Pac-12) and scored 6 … Had three homers (5th in the Pac-12), one double and one triple … Notched five multi-hit games and only went hitless twice in 15 games … Drove in a career high four runs against Seattle on 2/21, with a three-run homer and sacrifice fly … Played first-base and DH.

2019/FRESHMAN: Appeared in 35 games, making 29 starts for the Trojans as a freshman in 2019 … Had a slash line of .275/.358/.440, with 16 RBI and 14 runs scored … Led USC with a .348 batting average and .927 OPS during conference play … Notched seven doubles, one triple, and three home runs … Had three three-hit games on the season … Named to the All-Pac-12 team.

HIGH SCHOOL: Was a three-time All-League selection and played all four years on the varsity team at Norco High in Corona, Calif. … Was selected to the All-State first team as a senior … Hit .415 in his senior season and put up 10 home runs … Was the fifth-ranked catching prospect in California in the class of 2018 according to Perfect Game … Graduated in 2018 with high honors … Played four years of travel ball for CBA Marucci.

PERSONAL: Parents are John and Jen Owens and has one sister, Maddison … Is majoring in business at USC … Other hobbies include fishing, golf and playing basketball … Born March 13, 1999.

No stats available for the current season.
